## Expr class

Abstract class defining a shape of a \[\[Theme\]\]'s expression

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare abstract class Expr 
```

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |

|  [evaluate(env, scope, cache)](./harp-datasource-protocol.expr.evaluate.md) |  | Evaluate an expression returning a \[\[Value\]\] object. |
|  [exprIsDynamic()](./harp-datasource-protocol.expr.exprisdynamic.md) |  | Update the dynamic state of this \[\[Expr\]\].<!-- -->\[\[exprIsDynamic\]\] must never be called directly. |
|  [fromJSON(node, definitions, definitionExprCache)](./harp-datasource-protocol.expr.fromjson.md) | <code>static</code> | Parse expression in JSON form.<!-- -->If <code>definitions</code> are defined, then references (<code>['ref', name]</code>) are resolved.<!-- -->Pass <code>definitionExprCache</code> to reuse <code>Expr</code> instances created from definitions across many <code>fromJSON</code> calls. |
|  [instantiate(context)](./harp-datasource-protocol.expr.instantiate.md) |  | Instantiates this \[\[Expr\]\] by resolving references to the <code>get</code> and <code>has</code> operator using the given instantiation context. |
|  [intern(pool)](./harp-datasource-protocol.expr.intern.md) |  | Create a unique object that is structurally equivalent to this \[\[Expr\]\]. |
|  [isDynamic()](./harp-datasource-protocol.expr.isdynamic.md) |  | Returns <code>true</code> if a dynamic execution context is required to evaluate this \[\[Expr\]\]. |
|  [isExpr(value)](./harp-datasource-protocol.expr.isexpr.md) | <code>static</code> | Tests of given value is an \[\[Expr\]\]. |
|  [parse(code)](./harp-datasource-protocol.expr.parse.md) | <code>static</code> | Creates an expression from the given <code>code</code>. |
